name: Sundown Showdown
description:
1 vs 1 standoff game made during Train Jam 2017. Both players must hold the same controller. In order to fire, multiple buttons must be pressed, which can be felt by the other player holding the same controller. That other player can use that feedback to block the incoming shot, but each player only gets one chance!

Game ends when one player wins enough times in a row to advance Nidhogg-style to the end of the stage.
